text: Miguel Saiz (May 17, 1949 – October 22, 2019) was an Uruguayan-born Argentine politician. He was born in Montevideo. He was a member of the Radical Civic Union (UCR). He was the Governor of Río Negro Province from 2003 until 2011. Saiz died at a Buenos Aires hospital on October 22, 2019 from heart failure at the age of 70.Murió el exgobernador de Río Negro Miguel Saiz ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires Category:Río Negro Province
title: Miguel Saiz
